resources.string: No Internet Available. Please try later
Watch out for more details Here

People can catch COVID-19 from others who have the virus. The disease spreads primarily through small droplets from the nose or mouth, which are expelled when an infected person coughs, sneezes, or speaks.

If you feel sick you should rest, drink plenty of fluid, and eat nutritious food.
Stay in a separate room from other family members.
Everyone should keep a healthy lifestyle at home.

This is an infectious disease caused by newly discovered Novel Corona Virus.\n\nMost people who fall sick with COVID-19 will experience mild to moderate symptoms and recover without special treatment.
This app is developed to keep you updated with the latest worldwide updates on COVID19.\nThis app is still under development to provide you updated features.

Protect yourself and others around you by knowing the facts and taking appropriate precautions.

Consult your local medical authority for advice.

Follow advice provided by your local public health agency.
